summary: Honduras, officially the Republic of Honduras, is a Central American country bordering Guatemala, El Salvador, Nicaragua, and the Pacific and Caribbean seas. Its capital is Tegucigalpa. Historically home to Maya and other Mesoamerican cultures, it was colonized by Spain in the 1500s, gaining independence in 1821. Honduras has faced political instability and is one of the poorest countries in the Western Hemisphere. With an area of about 43,433 square miles and a population over 10 million, its economy mainly relies on agriculture, making it vulnerable to natural disasters. Honduras is known for its natural resources like coffee, fruits, and minerals.
title: Honduras
